message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $850000. It's a fantastic deal for both of us, and I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm willing to pay no more than $750000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, while I appreciate your offer, $750000 is unfortunately too low for me. Considering the unique value of this product and the potential benefits for your business, I believe a price closer to $800000 would be more equitable. I'm open to further discussion to find a mutually agreeable price.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not willing to go above $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $775000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the market value of the product.
